Located in Eixample, one of the most famous quarters of Barcelona, close to Placa Cataluna, the Hostal Felipe 2 offers warm and welcoming atmosphere. The completely renovated building boasts high ceilings, bright and big windows with views over the famous Diagonal. The Hostal Felipe 2 features single and double rooms and suites. The single rooms have a bathroom outside. Double rooms could be provided with twin beds or double bed. There are 3 suites available: one wi Read more >>> Book now Prices from 47.00 EUR Montmelo C/ Nou, 1, 08160, Montmelo, Spain Quiet and family hotel located in the Montmelo village, 20 km away from Barcelona. Read more >>> Book now Prices from 229.66 EUR AC Santo Mauro Hotel Zurbano 36, 28010, Madrid, Spain The Santo Mauro is an exclusive deluxe hotel housed in a historical building. This mansion, which recently celebrated its centennial, was built in 1894 by the French Architect Louis Legrand. The building, with a marked French influence, was the residence of the Duke of Santo Mauro and housed various ambassadors, the last one being from the Philippines. The hotel has 37 rooms, 11 suites, 21 double rooms and 6 singles. Even the old stables of the mansion have been changed into duplex rooms. All ha Read more >>> X Wait for reviews ... digest: Spain Hotels and accommodations directory offers hotel bookings in Spain for every budget from cheap hotels, inns, motels, to luxury lodging. Discount hotel reservations and special deals available. Customized hotel search options for your travel to Spain, vacations and business.
